bb.desc: 25 combo powerful Light attack on all foes (enormously boosts own critical hit rate), considerably raises normal hit amount for 3 turns, boosts max HP, boosts critical damage of Light types for 3 turns & greatly boosts Atk, Def of Light types for 3 turns
bb.name: Missouri Smash

dictionary.description: It's the Symbol of Peace himself, All Might! Colorful with a dramatic flair, the legendary hero and possessor of the One For All Quirk has stood as a protector of the people for years. He is very protective of those under his care, and can always be found smiling even in the face of danger. Plus Ultra!
dictionary.evolution:
I have to stop these villains...
Because I am the world's Symbol of Peace and Justice!
dictionary.fusion: A real hero will always find a way for justice to be served! Go beyond! Plus Ultra!
dictionary.summon: Fear not, kid!! I am here!

extra skill.desc: 40% boost to all parameters and 10% damage reduction when All Might's Cape is equipped, boosts Atk, Def each turn (up to 4 turns) for all allies, boosts critical damage & probable resistance against 2 KO attacks
extra skill.name: One for All

skill.desc: Considerably reduces BB gauge required for BB
skill.name: Considerably reduces BB gauge required for BB

skill.desc: Enhances LS's critical damage boost effect
skill.name: Enhances LS's critical damage boost effect

skill.desc: Enhances SBB's critical damage boost effect
skill.name: Enhances SBB's critical damage boost effect

skill.desc: Enhances success rate of BB/SBB's probable huge Atk, Def reduction effect
skill.name: Enhances success rate of BB/SBB's probable huge Atk, Def reduction effect

skill.desc: Enhances SBB's additional damage at turn's end effect but reduces duration to 1 turn
skill.name: Enhances SBB's additional damage at turn's end effect but reduces duration to 1 turn

skill.desc: Adds enormous critical hit rate boost for 3 turns effect to BB/SBB
skill.name: Adds enormous critical hit rate boost effect to BB/SBB

leader skill.desc: 150% boost to Atk, 100% boost to max HP, 30% boost to critical hit rate, 20% damage reduction for 2 turn when damage taken has exceeded certain amount, hugely boost critical damage & 20% boost to EXP gained
leader skill.name: Symbol of Peace

sbb.desc: 30 combo powerful Light attack on all foes (damage relative to remaining HP, enormously boosts own critical hit rate), adds all elements to attack for 3 turns, powerful additional attack at turn's end for 3 turns, hugely boosts all elemental damage for 3 turns, probable huge 2 turn Atk, Def reduction & greatly boosts critical damage for 3 turns
sbb.name: Texas Smash

ubb.desc: 33 combo massive Light attack on all foes (damage relative to remaining HP, enormously boosts own critical hit rate), 17 combo massive Light attack on single foe, 100% damage reduction from Light, Dark types for 3 turns, massive additional attack at turn's end for 3 turns & enormously boosts Light elemental damage for 3 turns
ubb.name: Detroit Smash
